title: Purina Tidy Cats Clumping Cat Litter, Free & Clean Unscented Multi Cat Litter - 38 lb. Box
description: Fill your cats' litter boxes with Purina Tidy Cats Free and Clean Unscented Clumping Multi Cat litter, and provide them with uncompromising odor control. This charcoal litter solution is free of fragrances and dyes, making it an ideal option for cats and pet parents who prefer unscented cat litter. Guaranteed odor control in the litter helps you maintain a fresh-smelling home for up to 10 days when used as directed, and our low dust clumping cat litter formula helps provide a clean pour. We formulate this clay unscented kitty litter with activated odor control charcoal to help absorb odors, and it forms tight, strong clumps for easy scooping. Let your cats paw their way through our low dust cat litter made with natural clay and activated charcoal, and watch as they purr in appreciation after each use. This Purina Tidy Cats odor control litter is backed by 70 years of litter expertise.
